title: Chief Accountant (Up To 2000$)
company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN CQ TDT ASIA
job_description:
Lead the charge on all accounting operations - think financial reporting, budgeting, forecasting, and tax compliance—with razor-sharp precision.
Partner with our leadership team to shape financial strategies that fuel our ambitious growth in the fintech space.
Oversee audits, ensure compliance with local and international regulations, and keep our books tighter than a vault.
Analyze data like a pro to uncover insights that drive smarter decisions and keep us ahead of the curve.
Take part in thrilling, high-impact projects - leveraging advanced financial tech and innovative payment systems - where your expertise can truly shine
Mentor a lean, agile accounting team and help us foster an environment of excellence.
Ensure timely and accurate delivery of internal reports, maintaining high standards of quality and reliability.
Perform tasks as assigned by Managers or BOD to support company objectives
requirements:
Degree qualified in Finance or Accounting from Academy of Finance, National Economics University, Banking Academy of Vietnam.
At least 05 years experience in Accounting with at least 03 years experience work as a Chief Accountant. Having Chief Accountant Certificate (require).
Good communication in English at work.
Good logic thinking.
Analytical and creative problem-solving skills.
Trustful person with good communication and interpersonal skills.
Multi-task, detail-oriented, highly focus, open-minded and well analytical.
Able to work independently and highly meticulous.
Knowledge of business and management principles and practices.
Knowledge of financial and accounting principles and practices.
Good MS Office skills particularly strong capabilities in MS Excel, strong accounting software (FAST).
Experience in the trading/ecommerce, fintech/ IT companies is an advantage.
